explanation: The stage direction describes the setting of the play, indicating that it represents the Palace of the Ocean and Thetis, accompanied by rivers, streams, etc. This aligns with the definition of category 11, which focuses on stage descriptions or play locations.
stgdir: Le théâtre représente le Palais de l'Ocean, et de Thétis, qui y sont accompagnez des Fleuves, des Rivières, des Fontaines, des Ruisseaux, etc.
